title: Manage Rail Car Inspection
description: Before a train is loaded, each empty rail car must be inspected for damage or debris.

tasks.description: A train arrives, and a work order is generated to inspect all its cars.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new inspection work order is created in the system.

tasks.description: Dispatch a team of inspectors to walk the length of the train.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspection team is assigned the job.

tasks.description: The inspectors check each car and report its status (OK, Damaged, Dirty). Any cars that fail inspection are flagged and not loaded.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspectors log their findings, flagging one car as 'Damaged'. The system prevents any container from being planned onto that car.
